channel.title: coffee on Zinzy's website
channel.description: Recent content in coffee on Zinzy's website

item.title: Walking with Annelie
item.description: Walking with Annelie is coffee indoors today. We’ve told each other we need to go on more walks. She asks if we should dress warmly for the cold, wet park, or if we should just grab a table inside. Normally at this hour, Coffee Company is packed to the brim with digital nomads, so “dress for cold, hope for warmth” I say. Miraculously, there are two tables from which we can choose.

item.title: Weak
item.description: What is the deal with people and coffee? No, let’s try that again. What is the deal with people and dish water? Coffee1 these days. Is. Disgusting. A Starbucks recently opened in Utrecht, and to celebrate the occassion, a dear friend of mine, whom I hadn’t seen in two years, suggested we meet there for a pumpkin spiced whatever. Pat, I’d love to buy a middle finger. Or else perhaps just a question mark.
